text:
We're using crm_objects HuBL function to fetch three filtered product record on email module. Code snippet is attached below. We're getting the correct data on email preview but when we try to send the email it's not giving any result. Is there any specific issue that anyone can help us to address here?

Any help would he appreciated.

code preview - <https://prnt.sc/My6gCD0v98mR>
visible in email editor - <https://prnt.sc/tbPjamNUkn63>
Not visible when try to send email on live devices - <https://prnt.sc/yYtg5sIfOPox>
